short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate random equations with answers - linear, simultaneous and quadratic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Practice Algebra with Ease

Generate and solve random linear, simultaneous, or quadratic equations instantly with a click.

This user-friendly Chrome extension provides a rich learning environment for students and teachers of all levels, from junior to high school.

Features:

1) Random Equation Generation: Create new equations instantly.
2) Multiple Equation Types: Practice with linear, simultaneous, and 
     quadratic equations.
3) Answer Checking: Verify your solutions with a single click.
4) Simple and Intuitive: Easy to learn and use.
5) Focus on learning, not struggling with tools.
